content: Suggestion: add the execution client's name&version as part of a consensus client's p2p agent string

content: It can be retrieved from web3_clientVersion. Engine API does not expose this method, correct ? as it only exposes `engine` and `eth`

content: It would be very useful to debug issues from peers in production to know the combinations
